title: Fluffy Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed (batter should be slightly lumpy).
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium. Lightly butter. Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake.
Cook until bubbles form and edges set, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup and butter.
notes: Swap half the milk for buttermilk for extra tang.
